title: Residents flee as sinkhole swallows cars in Rome
text:
Residents flee as sinkhole swallows cars in Rome 10:13am GMT - 00:49 
Residents were forced to evacuate their homes after a huge sinkhole opened up in the Italian capital on Wednesday. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Residents were forced to evacuate their homes after a huge sinkhole opened up in the Italian capital on Wednesday. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sxGzq1
